OrgName.entry: JOINT LEARNING DISABILITIES SERVICE - EMPLOYMENT SERVICES

AltName.entry: CROWN HILL EMPLOYMENT BASED SERVICES (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council. Offers an employment preparation unit for people with learning disabilities. Can offer training in catering, horticulture, IT, food hygiene, social and life skills and warehousing. Has workshops on-site for assembly and packaging. Provides a programme in retail, cooking and horticulture. Referral via social worker.
